channel.title: Gradschool on Got Bacon?
channel.description: Recent content in Gradschool on Got Bacon?

item.title: Of Mice and Mountains: A New Chapter Begins
item.description:
Hi, I’m Made —life took a turn, Left New York streets for labs where I learn. Now I’m going to L.A., where palm trees are nice, But mostly I’m here to study some mice.

Neuroscience! Brains! A glamorous grind, Staring at neurons and losing my mind. It’s scary! It’s sunny! I barely go out— But hey, the mice seem chill (no doubt).
